duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet with merchants to present and offer programs designed to save them money on credit/debit card processing and equipment.
Offer Cash Discount Program to eliminate merchant's processing fees and facilitate an easy deal.
Utilize strong work ethic and drive to succeed in customer service background to self-generate leads and obtain new business.
Provide excellent verbal, written, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills to effectively communicate the benefits of the programs offered.
Receive support from Sales Managers in every step of the sales process, from quoting to signing the deal.
